summary.span: 提供使用和發行遠端物件和 Proxy 的一些方法。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects and proxies.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非您處理的問題，例如啟用、 生命週期管理或交易的服務提供者，您不需要區分 proxy 參考的物件參考。Unless you are a service provider dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, or transactions, you do not need to distinguish between proxy references and object references. 遠端執行功能基礎結構會使用 transparent proxy 的印象遠端物件位於用戶端的空間。The remoting infrastructure uses transparent proxies that give the impression that the remote objects reside in the client's space. Proxy 會對它們在遠端位置的實際物件的呼叫轉送達到這個目的。Proxies achieve this by forwarding calls made on them to the real objects at remote locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用來在應用程式定義域界限間傳送的物件參考的物件的序列化表示法。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 建立的物件稱為封送處理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以另一個應用程式定義域透過通道傳送，（可能是在另一個處理序或電腦）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他應用程式網域中，一次必須剖析以建立物件，通常會連接至實際物件的 proxy。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 這項作業稱為解封送處理。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 期間解封送處理，剖析擷取的方法資訊的遠端物件和透明 proxy 和會建立物件。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. A包含描述的資訊和封送處理物件的類別，可唯一識別特定物件執行個體和通訊的 URI 相關如何連線到遠端應用程式的相關資訊，物件所在。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remote application where the object is located. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得指定之物件的執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to get a instance for the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/VB/client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件之間任何一種遠端界限的用戶端實際上正在使用 transparent proxy 物件。A client that uses an object across any kind of remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明 proxy 可讓您以為實際物件位於用戶端的空間。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它的做法是轉送實際使用的遠端執行功能基礎結構的物件上所進行的呼叫。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 傳輸 proxy 的 managed 執行階段類型的類別之執行個體所支援。The transparent proxy is backed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 實作從傳輸 proxy 轉送作業所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. Proxy 物件繼承的受管理的物件，例如記憶體回收相關聯的語意，支援的成員和方法，且可以擴充為新的類別。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. Proxy 會做為遠端物件 (透明 proxy)，位於同一個類別的物件，同時也是受管理的物件。The proxy acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and is also a managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容是已排序的屬性，定義環境所在的物件序列。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects that reside inside it. 內容的物件設定為需要某些自動服務，這類同步處理、 交易，在 just-in-time 啟動、 安全性和等等的啟用程序期間建立。Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 同一個內容可包含多個物件。Multiple objects can live inside a context. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件之間任何一種遠端界限的用戶端實際上正在使用 transparent proxy 物件。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明 proxy 可讓您以為實際物件位於用戶端的空間。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它的做法是轉送實際使用的遠端執行功能基礎結構的物件上所進行的呼叫。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明 proxy 裝載的 managed 執行階段類型的類別之執行個體本身是。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 實作從傳輸 proxy 轉送作業所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. Proxy 物件繼承的受管理的物件，例如記憶體回收相關聯的語意，支援的成員和方法，且可以擴充為新的類別。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 因此 proxy 具有雙重本質。一方面它必須做為遠端物件 (透明 proxy)，位於同一個類別的物件，而且是在其他受管理的物件本身。Thus the proxy has a dual nature; on the one hand it needs to act as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and on the other it is a managed object itself. 可用的 proxy 物件而不考慮內任何遠端處理細分。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 應用程式不需要區分 proxy 參考和物件參考。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 不過，處理問題，例如啟動服務提供者，存留期管理與交易需要進行這類差異。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以判斷物件是否為 proxy 或實際的物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to determine whether an object is a proxy or a real object. 完整範例程式碼，請參閱範例類別。For the complete example code, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CPP/ad.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CS/ad.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/VB/ad.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用來在應用程式定義域界限間傳送的物件參考的物件的序列化表示法。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 建立的物件稱為封送處理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以另一個應用程式定義域透過通道傳送，（可能是在另一個處理序或電腦）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他應用程式網域中，一次必須剖析以建立物件，通常會連接至實際物件的 proxy。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 這項作業稱為解封送處理。This operation is known as unmarshaling. A包含描述的資訊和封送處理物件的類別，可唯一識別特定物件執行個體和通訊的 URI 相關如何連線到遠端執行功能的子區塊資訊物件所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送處理，會使用從目前的執行緒內容，不是內容時所使用的物件建立。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 如果 URI 並未明確設定的方法，它會自動產生遠端身分識別基礎結構。If a URI was not explicitly set by the method, it is automatically generated by the remoting identity infrastructure. 您無法將與 proxy 的 URI 關聯的兩個原因： 在伺服器端物件，它表示，產生 URI 或物件為已知，在此情況下 URI 為已知。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 基於這個理由，如果`Obj`參數為 proxy，將會擲回例外狀況。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 自訂 proxy 被放寬這項限制，因為傳輸 proxy 會被視為伺服器物件。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是用來在應用程式定義域界限間傳送的物件參考的物件的序列化表示法。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 建立的物件稱為封送處理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以另一個應用程式定義域透過通道傳送，（可能是在另一個處理序或電腦）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他應用程式網域中，一次必須剖析以建立物件，通常會連接至實際物件的 proxy。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 這項作業稱為解封送處理。This operation is known as unmarshaling. A包含描述的資訊和封送處理物件的類別，可唯一識別特定物件執行個體和通訊的 URI 相關如何連線到遠端執行功能的子區塊資訊物件所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送處理，會使用從目前的執行緒內容，不是內容時所使用的物件建立。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 您無法將與 proxy 的 URI 關聯的兩個原因： 在伺服器端物件，它表示，產生 URI 或物件為已知，在此情況下 URI 為已知。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 基於這個理由，如果`Obj`參數為 proxy，將會擲回例外狀況。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 自訂 proxy 被放寬這項限制，因為傳輸 proxy 會被視為伺服器物件。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用目前方法來封送處理指定的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the current method to marshal a specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CPP/manualserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/CS/manualserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.BasicSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.BasicSample/VB/manualserver.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封送處理指定的物件時，會使用目前的方法所設定的 URI。The URI set by the current method is used when marshaling the given object. 指定之物件的 URI 設定中的字串封送處理之後,`uri`參數附加至的目前。After marshaling, the URI of the specified object is set to the string in the `uri` parameter appended onto the of the current . 如果目前的應用程式正在接聽的 HTTP 連接埠，則這兩個字串中指定`uri`參數和`uri`字串附加至目前的路由到指定的物件。If the current application is listening on an HTTP port, then both the string specified in the `uri` parameter and the `uri` string appended onto the of the current route to the specified object. 範例中，如果應用程式正在接聽 HTTP 連接埠 9000，則兩者http://localhost:9000/objectUri，和http://localhost:9000/ \ / o 路由至物件中指定`obj`參數。For example, if the application is listening on HTTP port 9000, then both http://localhost:9000/objectUri, and http://localhost:9000/\/objectUri route to the object specified in the `obj` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定將會使用 URI方法時封送處理指定的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the URI that will be used by the method when marshaling the specified object. A包含描述的資訊和封送處理物件的類別，可唯一識別特定物件執行個體和通訊的 URI 相關如何連線到遠端執行功能的子區塊資訊物件所在位置。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 最初建立時，proxy 是屬於型別。When first created, the proxy is of type . 您將它轉換成不同的類型，遠端執行功能基礎結構會追蹤的最常使用的型別，以避免不必要地載入型別。As you cast it into different types, the remoting infrastructure keeps track of the most used type to avoid loading the type unnecessarily.
